resources.string:
Established in 2008, iPredict ran as a political prediction market during the eight weeks prior to the election that year. It proved more accurate than three quarters of all political polls published in the run up to the election, confirming the effectiveness of money prediction markets.

 Since then, iPredict has accumulated over 4000 traders and has launched more than 7000 contracts, covering a wide variety of topics, from monthly gold prices, to the discovery of extraterrestrial life. 

 So, put your money where your mouth is and begin trading today!
